name: UFGCircuit
comment:
The actual connection info is stored in the graph that is made up by all the components (nodes) and wires (edges).
2 or more components are required to make up a circuit. It's not much of a circuit if you're the only one in it!

methods.name: GetCircuitID
methods.comment: @return This circuit's unique identifier; -1 if invalid.

methods.name: MarkAsChanged
methods.comment:
Marks the circuit as changed or for a full rebuild (slow).
@note Do not call this unless you know what you're doing.

methods.name: RegisterInteractingPlayer
methods.comment: Haxx to be able to disable replication when no one is looking at the circuit

methods.name: IsReplicatingDetails
methods.comment: @return true if this circuit is replicating detailed information about it; false otherwise.

methods.name: HasAuthority
methods.comment: Checks if our outer has authority, and assumes that if they have, then so do we.

methods.name: GetOwningCircuitSubsystem
methods.comment: Get the circuit subsystem that owns us.

methods.name: TickCircuit
methods.comment: Called when the circuit is ticked.

methods.name: OnCircuitChanged
methods.comment: Called by the circuit subsystem when changes are made to the circuitry.

methods.name: SetReplicateDetails
methods.comment: Set if we should replicate details.

properties.name: mCircuitID
properties.comment: The id used to identify this circuit.

properties.name: mComponents
properties.comment: List of all the components (nodes) in this circuit.

properties.name: mNeedFullRebuild
properties.comment: Do this circuit needs to be rebuilt, e.g. wires or components have been removed.

properties.name: mHasChanged
properties.comment: True if this circuit has changed.

properties.name: mReplicateDetails
properties.comment: If this buildable is replicating details, i.e. for the UI.

properties.name: mInteractingPlayers
properties.comment: All players interacting with a building that's connected to this circuit
